answers.author: Jared Dailey
answers.text:
Laurence:  What's the name of the table you're reviewing?  I referred to the MYBs for 2007, 2008, and 2009 and only the 2008 edition has a Table 1/9 (entitled "Options for Prefunding Retiree Liability").  I don't know if we have the table information for 2011 but it would help to know for sure what you are requesting.

answers.author: Laurence Johnson
answers.text:
hello, again.  my mistake in using the term "table."  it's directory 1/9 that i've been using.  my specific interest is in form of government (CM vs. MC) for a sample of 200 municipalities.  grateful for any help!  lj

answers.author: Jared Dailey
answers.text:
Hi Laurence...form of government is right up my alley so please call or email me directly so I can get you the information you need.  Earlier editions of the MYBs did not report CM vs. MC for only 200 municipalities but for those with a population of 2,500 or greater.

author: Laurence Johnson
text:
i'm using table 1/9 from the municipal year books 2007-2010 at my university's library.  the 2011 YB does not have the table, noting that ICMA policy now is to exclude some info from hard copy that is available on line.
i cannot find the table 1/9 info for 2011 using a key word search.  can you help?
many thanks,
laurence johnson
associate professor of accounting
colo. state univ.
title: where can i find municipal year book table 1/9 on line for 2011?
